org.epics.pvmanager

Class PVReaderEvent<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.epics.pvmanager.PVReaderEvent<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the reader

    public class PVReaderEvent<T>
extends Object
    An event for the reader.

    An event can be trigger by:

    • a connection change; the connection either connected or disconnected
    • an exception; an error either at the datasource or while calculating the expression
    • a value change
    One event can have multiple triggers. You can use the mask or the methods to check what condition applies.
    Author:
    carcassi
